name: Panic (Markom3D)
description:
This is a game created form the MEGA Epic Game Jam for 2019

It is a short FPS Scifi Escape room where you are a mechanic stuck on a ship, as it barrels towards earth. If you dont get it up and running, you will burn up in the atmosphere. 

Blender was used for the modeling and the game engine is Unreal Engine
